page.title: 17BILSDALE LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: The Bilsdale Study Group was formed in October 1982 to foster an appreciation of the dale through the study of local history, archaeology, geology and natural history.The organisation is informal, with no committee, just the founders Dennis & Wendy Proudman of Hagg House and Ida Atkinson of The Lonning, acting as chairman, treasurer and secretary respectively.There is no formal membership. It was hoped to encourage local people to take such interests and to report their findings at monthly meetings; In practice, both locals and people from out of the dale have attended.Those present contribute 25p to cover expenses.Funds have been helped by several generous donations from those unable to attend.The average attendance is about 15,but 40 is our highest and 8 the lowest.
